title: Junaya house
summary:
Enjoy the Tranquility of Nature at Junaya House Discover a hidden paradise surrounded by green tropical forests and a serene atmosphere away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Our accommodation offers an unforgettable stay with a private pool directly overlooking the beautiful valley. Imagine a morning starting with birds chirping. Every corner of the space is designed to bring tranquility, be one with nature, and provide maximum comfort for those who want to rest.

The space
‚ú® Privileges for Our Guests ‚ú®
	‚Ä¢ 	Free Airport Pickup: For those of you staying more than 7 nights, we provide a free airport pickup service as a token of appreciation for your long visit.
	‚Ä¢ 	Exclusive Souvenirs: Every guest who stays at Junaya House will receive a free souvenir as a keepsake of a pleasant stay with us.

Guest access
üîë Guest Access

During their stay, guests will enjoy full and private access to all areas of Junaya House, including:
	‚Ä¢ 	Bedroom 
	‚Ä¢	Private bathrooms
	‚Ä¢ 	Outdoor stone bathtub ‚Äì the perfect place to relax and blend in with nature
	‚Ä¢ 	Spacious open living room, complete with sofa and dining table
	‚Ä¢ 	Full kitchen with cooking utensils and dinnerware
	‚Ä¢ 	Sun lounger to enjoy the sunshine
	‚Ä¢ 	A quiet and refreshing private pool

As a host, I'll welcome you in person at check-in and make sure you feel at home. I'm happy to share information about local eateries, exciting activities, and hidden gems around the area.

Hospitality is an important part of the experience of staying at Junaya House. If there's anything you need‚Äîfrom recommendations to any help‚ÄîI'm always happy to help.

Thank you, I appreciate it. We look forward to welcoming you to Junaya House. üåø

Other things to note
üìå Other Details to Note

There's nothing special to note. We just hope you enjoy your stay at Junaya House üåø

reviews.text:
It was a wonderful stay.
And everything was made as easy as necessary and we were able to relax really well.
If needed, the property also provides airport pick-up and a tour guide. 
Both were very pleasant and always on time. 
Since the house is a bit out of the way, there are some restaurant recommendations that also deliver food. 
The view was simply breathtaking and can only be recommended!
The host's English is perfect and he's always there for you! 
No matter what, he fulfills every wish! 
Thank you for your time and for having us!

Nanda was super friendly and dedicated. Communication was possible in English and was very straightforward. We felt totally comfortable there and would definitely go back. 
The accommodation is idyllic, is beautiful with a fantastic view of the jungle and is quietly located, perfect for switching off. It's good to know that you should plan a short drive for shopping, but this underlines the tranquility and proximity to nature of the location.

Welkom in paradise! The villa was newly built and we loved everything about the place. A stunning small pool in a lush green garden set on a slope with views to the rainforest. The villa has a small kitchen, an outdoor sitting area and is tastefully furnished. There is an outdoor stone bath which we loved. If you want to spoil your self this is the place! Nanda, thank you again for the amazing service. See you next timeüôè

Wonderful accommodation that I recommend without a second thought, the amenities available are functional, very clean and a magnificent view!
In addition, the host is very welcoming and was constantly at our disposal when we needed it, we were able to have a dinner at home thanks to him and his family as well as a floating breakfast, thank you to them for this impeccable organization.
Thanks again!

Nanda was very helpful and welcoming. He was very attentive and made sure our stay was comfortable and accommodating. He even gifted us a small souvenir, helped with our luggage, and waited with us at check out until our driver arrived. This home was beautiful just as pictured and super clean. Would definitely recommend to anyone coming here and would definitely stay again.

The place is really beautiful and magical! The perfect romantic getaway for a couple. Or to get some quality alone time if you travel solo. 
Nanda was a great host. Super friendly, always responsive and very proactive.
Can't recommend the place enough, it's a true gem!
Thanks for everything. I'll be back!

A very nice host, who responded quickly and was very friendly. The host even delivered food when you ordered from a nearby warung. If there was anything, the host was there within 10 minutes to help, very attentive!
Fantastic view and fully equipped!
Definitely worth staying here; we highly recommend it!

This place was beyond words, the view of the jungle was incredible the architecture and design of the house was magical and it was super clean and modern. The host was super responsive and welcoming and was so kind to us. The best place to stay for your visit in Bali you won‚Äôt regret choosing this place

What a fantastic place! The villa is beautiful and offers a breathtaking view of the jungle. The owner is incredibly friendly and always willing to help ‚Äì nothing is too much to ask, everything is arranged immediately. We felt completely at home and had a great week. Absolutely recommended!

We really enjoyed our stay in Junaya! It was a beautiful accommodation and very hygienic. In addition, a super friendly host, who is always available and always ready to help. We had a great time here!
We would recommend this cottage to anyone!!

We had a wonderfull time at Junaya. The pool and bath were amazing. Everything was very clean and they did everything to make you feel welcome. The shower was a bit difficult to control the heat, but overall great experience.

Amazing stay! Exactly like the pictures, absolutely beautiful and communication was great from the host, messaged daily to check how everything was and happy to deliver anything and clean when requested.
it looked really good just as shown pictures very aesthetic the staff was Friendly no problem just there was no privacy as there Locals who were climbing on trees to cut bad leaves and watching us
Beautiful stay at Junaya house the villa is incredibly beautiful with breathtaking views. Nanda was very responsive to everything, was very kind, I highly recommend. Thank you for this trip
Such a beautiful place! The host was lovely and always willing to help! Will definitely stay again :)
I stayed in various places in Bali, but this is my favorite place, as beautiful as the photos.

We absolutely loved this house. We stayed for 8 nights and it still didn‚Äôt feel long enough. Nanda is truly the best host; he was always attentive and made sure we had everything we needed.
The pool was in perfect condition ‚Äî the cleanest we‚Äôve seen among all the Airbnbs we stayed at. The house itself is beautifully decorated, and you can even hear the traditional ceremonies at 6 am and 6 pm, which adds a special touch to the atmosphere. Since the house is located further north, it gets a bit chilly in the mornings and evenings.
Also, the hot tub was the highlight! Its so big! We really enjoyed it. 
The only challenge is that the house is a bit far from restaurants, so food delivery can take up to an hour. Luckily, there‚Äôs a nearby restaurant, and Nanda kindly brought us food from there whenever we asked.
Finding a Grab or Gojek was never an issue, and there are plenty of things to do in the area.
We would love to come back again. Thank you, Nanda, for everything!

highlights.title: Dive right in
highlights.description: This is one of the few places in the area with a pool.

highlights.title: Great check-in experience
highlights.description: Recent guests loved the smooth start to this stay.

highlights.title: Junaya is a Superhost
highlights.description: Superhosts are experienced, highly rated Hosts.
